sentence.Network_en: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

sentence.Network_en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

sentence.Network_en: There's been no trace of my aunt and uncle.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有我姑姑、姑夫的踪迹。

phrase.cizu_name: cry (或 say 或 yell) uncle
Uncle Tom Cobley (或 Cobleigh) and all

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)used to denote a long list of people
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)表示一长串人名单

jx.jx_en_mean: To indicate a willingness to give up a fight or surrender
jx.jx_cn_mean: 投降：愿意放弃战斗或投降

lj.lj_ly: Members of the gang held him down until at last he cried uncle.
lj.lj_ls: 一帮盗贼强按住他直到最后他喊投降

phrase.cizu_name: cry uncle 或 say uncle 【非正式用语】

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French oncle, from late Latin aunculus, alteration of Latin avunculus 'maternal uncle' (see avuncular)

entry.tran: 伯父；叔叔；舅舅；姑父；姨父
entry.def: Someone's uncle is the brother of their mother or father, or the husband of their aunt.

example.ex: My uncle was the mayor of Memphis...
example.tran: 我伯父是孟菲斯市市长。

example.ex: A telegram from Uncle Fred arrived...
example.tran: 弗雷德舅舅发的一封电报来了。

means.word_mean: 1. the brother of your father or mother; the husband of your aunt
2. a source of help and advice and encouragement;

list.explanation: (黑社会用语)联邦政府工作人员(包括特工人员),联邦政府的下层机构

example.en: Unde Whiskers is on our tail. Let's blow town.
example.zh: 联邦政府的特工在盯我们的梢。咱们出城去吧。

example.en: Mr.Whiskers is trying to get me to pay tax on those few bucks.
example.zh: 联邦政府的税务机构正在千方百计地想叫我为那几块钱的收入缴税。

list.explanation: 严谨的、不留情面的批评者或训斥者，爱挑毛病的人

example.en: If I can be a Dutch uncle for a minute, I could give you some good advice.
example.zh: 如果我能当一分钟铁面而无私的批评者，我就 可以向你提出不错的意见。

example.en: a Dutch uncle whose every word is repmof
example.zh: 一个挑剔的人，句句话都责备人

auth_sentence.content: He is the uncle of film composer Ryan Shore.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is the uncle of film composer Ryan Shore.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is the uncle of film composer Ryan Shore.

auth_sentence.content: Her mother...was directly descended from Oliver Goldsmith's uncle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her mother...was directly descended from Oliver Goldsmith's uncle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her mother...was directly descended from Oliver Goldsmith's uncle.

auth_sentence.content: I was left a thousand pounds by an uncle.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was left a thousand pounds by an uncle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was left a thousand pounds by an uncle.

Sentence.sentence: Don't spend a paragraph on how your uncle John tried to fix the problem and couldn't.

means.word_mean: 伯父, 叔父, 舅父, 姑父, 姨父

sentences.en: I'll go to see your uncle presently.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿就去看望你叔叔。

jushi.english: We are looking forward to our uncle's visit with great pleasure.
jushi.chinese: 我们高兴地盼着叔叔来做客。

jushi.english: The people would have starved if Uncle Sam hadn't sent dozens of aircraft carrying tons of grain.
jushi.chinese: 如果美国政府不派出几十架飞机运送许多吨粮食的话,这些人就已挨饿了。

jushi.english: His uncle found him a well-paid job in Shanghai.
jushi.chinese: 他伯父在上海给他找了一个薪水不少的差事。
